idea-plugin.name: Bright and Sheen Theme
idea-plugin.description:
Adds Visual Studio Code styled Bright and Sheen color theme to IntelliJ

Notable features:

Theme is specifically created to work well with Java and Spring projects. Makes the code readability better and faster productivity.



To install:

  • Go to Settings | Plugins, find the theme plugin and install it
  • Restart the IDE
  • Go to Settings | Appearance & Behavior | Appearance and select Bright and Shine in the Theme dropdown
  • Or to select only an editor scheme go to Settings | Editor | Color Scheme and select Bright and Shine in the Scheme dropdown
